products.name: Coffee Table
products.shortdes: It has space where you keep your table essentials easily.
products.descrip1: Modern Design - This Modern Nightstand is made of MDF with superior craftsmanship for optimized strength and long lasting durability. Sleek design complements any room decor or any style of furniture. •
products.descrip2: Spacious Storage Nightstand with drawer living room/bedroom sofa/bed side table offers you sufficient storage space to storing your books, charging cable and other necessary bedside items.
products.descrip3: Easy to Clean - This storage bedside table requires assembly. You just need to follow the instructions for easy installation. Smooth surface, easy to clean. Care Instructions: Wipe it clean with a dry cloth. Wipe any spills immediately. Always use coasters or mats while keeping hot, cold or wet materials on the table.

products.name: Wardrobe
products.shortdes: The oval shape allows the hangers to twist on the pole easily
products.descrip1: Introducing the Adona WR1 Engineered Wood 1 Door Wardrobe in an adorable finish of Blue. •
